author: Mark Manson
description:
What if resilience isn’t pre-determined, but a skill you can build? After reading some MRI studies about stress-response, I’m going to try to train my mind the same way athletes train their bodies. In this video, I prep for a brutal 15K obstacle race, unpack the neuroscience behind building resilience, and give you five concrete mindsets to get mentally tougher. I even have one secret I save for race day. Stay hard. 

FREE: For practical advice each week that might change your life, sign up for my newsletter here: http://bit.ly/3JRg3NX

If you are not already a member of my premium community, get access to monthly challenges and daily action steps that add up to real change here: https://mrk.mn/ZcFwvxv

Oh yeah, and I’m Mark Manson, 3x #1 NY Times bestselling author of:
The Subtle Art of Not Giving a Fck - https://mrk.mn/3svfxcu
Everything Is Fcked: A Book About Hope - https://mrk.mn/2RNxVAD

Other places I share useful wisdom you won’t hate:
INSTAGRAM: https://instagram.com/markmanso
title: How to Build a Mind so Tough it Scares People

author: Mark Manson
description:
Strong people own their mistakes, seek growth, and speak the truth. Weak people avoid discomfort, chase attention, and try to prove themselves.

Which type of person are you?
title: Strong People vs. Weak People
